data.title: NYNEX Definition
data.meta_description: Define NYNEX. has the meaning set forth in the recitals hereto.
data.text:
A part-time employee shall not be paid for absence due to sickness (not under the NYNEX Pension Plan and Sickness and Accident Disability Benefit Plan) unless such absence due to sickness occurs on a day of the week on which the employee is normally scheduled to work.

NYNEX ENTERPRISE NETWORK RECONFIGURATION SERVICE (Cont'd)As of June 30, 2022, this service is not provided to new customers.

CENTREX AND PBX SERVICES Subject to requirements relating to 911 access, effective November 1, 2019, all new NYNEX Digital Centrex Plus systems must utilize dial 9 access to the Public Switched Telephone Network (PSTN).
